overview: Three women, three men, three days and two nights on a blind date trip! Min-soo and Yeong-ju, who are lovers, will arrange a pension date for 2 days and 1 night for solo friends, and Min-su will take a quiet suburban pension with his democrat and a 23-year-old mother-to-be solo performance to his boyfriend, who is inverted. title: Sex Education for Older Brother
